mapper.insert: insert into product_category (category_id, created_dtm, created_id, updated_dtm, updated_id) values (#{categoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createdDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updatedDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.select: select category_id, product_id, created_dtm, created_id, updated_dtm, updated_id from product_category
